resources.string: Trigger system-trusted NFC events without a physical tag.

Trigger system-trusted NFC events without a physical tag by Xposed.
Usage: 1\. Activate this module in Xposed Manager. 2\. Restart NFC service with: su -c \"pkill -f com.android.nfc\" 3\. Click the \'Select File\' button to use.
Please place the tag that needs to save the NDEF file in the phone\'s card reader area.
